context: Mining company evaluating expansion of open-pit operation, requiring comprehensive environmental impact assessment

request.purpose: Environmental impact assessment and mitigation planning for mine expansion
request.justification: Regulatory requirement for expansion, improved environmental compliance, enhanced community relations

decision_process.outcome: Identified significant impacts on water quality and biodiversity
Developed mitigation plans reducing impacts by 70%
Received conditional approval with enhanced monitoring

business_impact.expected_outcome: Approved mine expansion with enhanced environmental protections

lessons_learned: Early community engagement prevents opposition, comprehensive baseline data enables better decision-making, mitigation costs often underestimated
